snippet: The United States and Australia were close to announcing a deal in which the United States would resettle hundreds of asylum seekers banished by Australia to Pacific island camps, a newspaper reported Friday....
lead_paragraph: The United States and Australia were close to announcing a deal in which the United States would resettle hundreds of asylum seekers banished by Australia to Pacific island camps, a newspaper reported Friday.

headline.main: Report: U.S. Close to Accepting Hundreds of Australia's Refugees
headline.print_headline: Report: US close to accepting 100s of Australia's refugees
